name: The Shadow of Hell
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
This is a classic clicker, in which you need to destroy enemies by gaining points. But be careful, green ones add glasses, and red ones take away.

In a parallel world where everything is subject to another law, a rift appeared, from which unknown creatures appeared.

They destroyed everything in their path until a hero appeared, able to stop them ...

In the game The Shadow of Hell, you have to repel the onslaught of enemies who will not spare anybody. Only you can destroy them!

But, be careful! This world is fraught with many dangers that literally emerge from nowhere.

And remember, a good enemy is a dead enemy!
